headline: 3M Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The 3M Company Board of Directors (NYSE:MMM) today declared a dividend on the company's common stock of $0.78 per share for the first quarter of 2026. The dividend is payable March 12, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Feb. 13, 2026.

headline: Illinois Tool Surpasses Q4 Earnings Estimates, Issues 2026 View
summary: ITW tops Q4 estimates with EPS up 7% and revenue growth, lifts margins and sets 2026 EPS at $11.00-$11.40 with buybacks planned.

headline: [Latest] Global Automotive Adhesives and Sealants Market Size/Share Worth USD 13.18 Billion by 2035 at a 6.9% CAGR: Custom Market Insights (Analysis, Outlook, Leaders, Report, Trends, Forecast, Growth Rate, Value, SWOT Analysis)
summary: [220+ Pages Latest Report] According to a market research study published by Custom Market Insights, the demand analysis of Global Automotive Adhesives and Sealants Market size & share revenue was valued at approximately USD 7.26 Billion in 2025 and is expected to reach USD 7.76 Billion in 2026 and is expected to reach around USD 13.18 Billion by 2035, at a CAGR of 6.9% between 2026 and 2035. The key market players listed in the report with their sales, revenues and strategies are Henkel AG & Co
